pkgmetadata.longdescription: 'DataSHIELD' Server Site Base Functions // Base 'DataSHIELD' functions for the server side. 'DataSHIELD' is a software package which allows you to do non-disclosive federated analysis on sensitive data. 'DataSHIELD' analytic functions have been designed to only share non disclosive summary statistics, with built in automated output checking based on statistical disclosure control. With data sites setting the threshold values for the automated output checks. For more details, see 'citation("dsBase")'.
